divs: Sighting DetailsAll it does is just site ther and sometimes blink and looks something like a star but it is realy not a star at first i thought it was the north star but as i lookedat it threw some binoculars i saw ttwo lights on the the thing and i see some rain bow like colors on the thing like red,blue,gren lighs i see this thing in the sky every clear stary night. One time me and my dad and my girl friend was at a baseball game and we seen the same object and my dad thought it was a plain he said it ws getting closer but the object seem to be in the same spott And me and my girl now know that is not a plain nor a star we think it is something else like a UFO or something.
Summary: It be out there every night on a clear stary night
Object Shape: Circle, Disc, Oval, Sphere, Star-like, Unknown
